titleStmt.title: Bristols second address, as it was presented to their late members in Parliament, at their return from Oxford to the right worshipful Sir Richard Hart, Knight, Mayor of the city of Bristol, and Thomas Earl, Esquire, our late representatives in Parliament of for the said city and county of Bistol.
titleStmt.author: Earle, Thomas.
Hart, Richard, Sir.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
